bibl.title: BGU I 174 + 189: an early Roman contract from Soknopaiou Nesos
bibl.seg: W. Graham Claytor, BGU I 174 + 189: An Early Roman Contract from Soknopaiou Nesos.

Acknowledgment of a loan of money, consisting only of the opening protocol, the subscription and the notary's registration docket; the verso bears a bilingual docket with a brief description of the contract. Soknopaiou Nesos, 22 August, 7 CE.
bibl.note: Acknowledgment of a loan of money, consisting only of the opening protocol, the subscription and the notary's registration docket; the verso bears a bilingual docket with a brief description of the contract. Soknopaiou Nesos, 22 August, 7 CE.
